info.description: The Journeys service enables applications to access, craft, configure, preview, and distribute personalized and contextual experiences for the moments that matter in a user's career or personal life with steps and suggestions.
info.title: journeys

tags.name: distributionRequests
tags.description: Provides the ability to create events to distribute journeys.

post.description: Creates a single journey distribution instance with the specified data. In the request body, specify 1 of the 2 required fields: builder or discoverableBuilder. Specify receipients if applicable, or if this is a support journey, and if you'd like to exclude recipients who've already received this journey instance. Secured by: Distribute Journeys, Self-Service: Journey Distribution Scope: Journeys

400.description:
Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
Error Code | Validation Message
--- | ---
A2642 | You can't distribute the journey builder with category [category] to recipients: [invalidTargets].
A2643 | Use the Mass Operation Management task in conjunction with the Distribute Journeys Mass Operation Type to distribute journeys to more than 100 targets.
A2644 | Selected recipients are not active in the system to receive this journey: [invalidTargets].
A2645 | You must have access to distribute to the following recipients: [insertTargets].
A2652 | You don't have access to distribute this journey builder.
A2654 | You must use a builder that is ready to distribute.
A2698 | Specify a valid journey category that matches the selected support targets.
A2699 | Specify a valid journey target for the related role, such as a manager that supports a worker.
A2700 | Specify fields for direct distribution or distribution of support journeys, but not for both or none.
A2763 | You can only specify either discoverableBuilder for self-distribution or builder field for admin initiated distribution, but not both or none.
A2778 | You don't have access to self-distribute a journey.
A2788 | You can only specify the discoverableBuilder field for self service distribution. Remove any other fields from the request.
A2871 | This journey is already in your active journeys, so you can't self-distribute it.

id.description: Workday Id or Reference Id of the instance.

descriptor.description: The display name of the instance

code.description: The code that corresponds to the error message. Use the error code to drive programmatic error-handling behavior. Don't use error message strings for this purpose because they are subject to change

field.description: The field related to the error

path.description: The path of the field related to the error

items.description: This object represents the possible facets for this resource

facetParameter.description: The alias used to select the facet

count.description: The number of instances returned by this facet

id.description: Workday Id or Reference Id of the instance.

builder_eb51ec4348f71000259081f105d20000.description: A journey builder groups required and recommended steps into one experience that you can craft, configure, and distribute.

category_8c36f269789510003a2bde6a849b000.description: A journey category groups similar journey builders together.

discoverableBuilder_eb51ec4348f710001d34.description: A discoverable journey builder groups the required and recommended steps into 1 experience that you can distribute.

id.description: The id for Journey Category Target (Derived)

relatedRole_057e88bd0cd11000163dab8e1e14.description: The role related to the support targets, such as a manager, that'll receive support journeys.

id.description: The id for Journey Category Target (Derived)

recipients.description: Journey recipients are people who receive a journey, such as \~workers\~ or students.

journeys.description: Journeys can be created, configured, personalized and distributed to recipients such as \~workers\~ or students.

includePreviousRecipients.description: Include recipients who've already received this journey builder.

supportTargets.description: The workers whom the distributed journeys support.

descriptor.description: The display name of the instance

id.description: The id for Journey Distribution Event
